FuncDef:
The erps self-heal disable command disables ERPS self-healing.
The undo erps self-heal disable command enables ERPS self-healing. The erps self-heal disable command disables ERPS self-healing. The undo erps self-heal disable command enables ERPS self-healing. By default, ERPS self-healing is enabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
ExtraInfo: When an ERPS ring is stable and no fault occurs, if a non-owner node unexpectedly sends an R-APS PDU carrying the signal failure (SF) field, the RPL owner node on the ERPS ring may be unblocked, causing a loop. To eliminate the loop through status detection, enable ERPS self-healing.
